qas.question: Most videos enable users to do what
What has attracted negative attention about comments on youtube besides their content?
Time in 2006 wrote that youtube harnessed the wisdom and what else of humanity?
Which magazine wrote about youtube in a 2009 article on user comments?
Some of the positive aspects of youtube might be that it provides what on a scale we've never seen before?

plausible_answers.text: "community and collaboration on a scale never seen before"

qas.question: What did Time say about YouTube in 2009?

plausible_answers.text: Some of the comments on YouTube make you weep for the future of humanity just for the spelling alone, never mind the obscenity and the naked hatred

qas.question: What did the Guardian say about the comments on YouTube in 2006?
What can users leave on all videos?
